                  but_drv PROC
;;;3046   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;3047   void but_drv(void)
005ad8  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;3048   {
;;;3049   
;;;3050   but_n=IO1PIN|(0xFFFFFFFFUL&(~(1UL<<BUT0))&(~(1UL<<BUT1))&(~(1UL<<BUT2))&(~(1UL<<BUT3))&(~(1UL<<BUT4)));
005adc  e59f6c68          LDR      r6,|L1.26444|
005ae0  e5960010          LDR      r0,[r6,#0x10]
005ae4  e59f3c64          LDR      r3,|L1.26448|
005ae8  e3e0181f          MVN      r1,#0x1f0000
005aec  e1802001          ORR      r2,r0,r1
;;;3051   if((but_n==0xffffffffUL)||(but_n!=but_s))
;;;3052    	{
;;;3053    	speed=0;
;;;3054    
;;;3055      	if (((but0_cnt>=BUT_ON)||(but1_cnt!=0))&&(!l_but))
;;;3056     		{
;;;3057      	     n_but=1;
;;;3058             but=*(((char*)&but_s)+2);
005af0  e58320b8          STR      r2,[r3,#0xb8]  ; but_n
005af4  e28300bc          ADD      r0,r3,#0xbc
005af8  e2831000          ADD      r1,r3,#0              ;3050
005afc  e5d04002          LDRB     r4,[r0,#2]
005b00  e5d1e01b          LDRB     lr,[r1,#0x1b]         ;3055
005b04  e5d1001c          LDRB     r0,[r1,#0x1c]         ;3055
;;;3059   
;;;3060             }
;;;3061      	if (but1_cnt>=but_onL_temp)
005b08  e5d1101d          LDRB     r1,[r1,#0x1d]
005b0c  e3720001          CMN      r2,#1                 ;3051
;;;3062     		{
;;;3063      	     n_but=1;
;;;3064    
;;;3065             but=*(((char*)&but_s)+2)&0x7f;
005b10  e204c07f          AND      r12,r4,#0x7f
005b14  e3a05001          MOV      r5,#1                 ;3057
005b18  e3a07000          MOV      r7,#0                 ;3053
005b1c  0a000002          BEQ      |L1.23340|
005b20  e59380bc          LDR      r8,[r3,#0xbc]         ;3051  ; but_s
005b24  e1520008          CMP      r2,r8                 ;3051
005b28  0a000011          BEQ      |L1.23412|
                  |L1.23340|
005b2c  e35e0004          CMP      lr,#4                 ;3055
005b30  e5c3701f          STRB     r7,[r3,#0x1f]         ;3053  ; speed
005b34  2a000001          BCS      |L1.23360|
005b38  e3500000          CMP      r0,#0                 ;3055
005b3c  0a000003          BEQ      |L1.23376|
                  |L1.23360|
005b40  e5d3e020          LDRB     lr,[r3,#0x20]         ;3055  ; l_but
005b44  e35e0000          CMP      lr,#0                 ;3055
005b48  05c35021          STRBEQ   r5,[r3,#0x21]         ;3057  ; n_but
005b4c  05c3401a          STRBEQ   r4,[r3,#0x1a]         ;3058  ; but
                  |L1.23376|
005b50  e1500001          CMP      r0,r1                 ;3061
005b54  25c35021          STRBCS   r5,[r3,#0x21]         ;3063  ; n_but
005b58  25c3c01a          STRBCS   r12,[r3,#0x1a]  ; but
;;;3066             }
;;;3067       	l_but=0;
;;;3068      	but_onL_temp=BUT_ONL;
005b5c  e3a00014          MOV      r0,#0x14
005b60  e5c37020          STRB     r7,[r3,#0x20]         ;3067  ; l_but
005b64  e5c3001d          STRB     r0,[r3,#0x1d]  ; but_onL_temp
;;;3069       	but0_cnt=0;
005b68  e5c3701b          STRB     r7,[r3,#0x1b]  ; but0_cnt
;;;3070     	but1_cnt=0;

                  timer1_interrupt PROC
;;;5946   //***********************************************
;;;5947   __irq void timer1_interrupt(void) 
00924c  e92d50ff          PUSH     {r0-r7,r12,lr}
;;;5948   {
;;;5949   T1IR = 0xff; // Clear timer 0 interrupt line.
009250  e59f1490          LDR      r1,|L1.38632|
009254  e3a000ff          MOV      r0,#0xff
009258  e5810000          STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;5950   
;;;5951   adc_drv();
00925c  ebfffffe          BL       adc_drv
;;;5952   
;;;5953   if(++t0cnt4>=10)
009260  e59f6478          LDR      r6,|L1.38624|
;;;5954        {
;;;5955        t0cnt4=0;
;;;5956        b1000Hz=1;
;;;5957   
;;;5958   	bFF=(char)(GET_REG( IO0PIN, 22, 1));
009264  e59f2480          LDR      r2,|L1.38636|
009268  e1d602be          LDRH     r0,[r6,#0x2e]         ;5953  ; t0cnt4
;;;5959   	if(bFF!=bFF_) hz_out++;
00926c  e59f147c          LDR      r1,|L1.38640|
009270  e3a05001          MOV      r5,#1                 ;5956
009274  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;5953
009278  e1a00800          LSL      r0,r0,#16             ;5953
00927c  e1a00840          ASR      r0,r0,#16             ;5953

00929c  e59f0450          LDR      r0,|L1.38644|

0092a4  e1a03b23          LSR      r3,r3,#22             ;5958

0092b0  e59f3440          LDR      r3,|L1.38648|

;;;5963        }

                  main PROC
;;;6057   //===============================================
;;;6058   int main (void)

;;;6062   IODIR1 |= (1<<21);                        /* P1.16..23 defined as Outputs */

009600  e3a04000          MOV      r4,#0                 ;6163
009604  ea000003          B        |L1.38424|
                  |L1.38408|
009608  e1a00004          MOV      r0,r4                 ;6163
00960c  ebfffffe          BL       bps_drv
009610  e2840001          ADD      r0,r4,#1              ;6163
009614  e20040ff          AND      r4,r0,#0xff           ;6163
                  |L1.38424|
009618  e1d606f6          LDRSH    r0,[r6,#0x66]         ;6163  ; NUMIST
00961c  e1540000          CMP      r4,r0                 ;6163
009620  bafffff8          BLT      |L1.38408|
009624  ebfffffe          BL       bps_hndl
009628  e5d80000          LDRB     r0,[r8,#0]  ; BAT_IS_ON
00962c  e3500000          CMP      r0,#0
009630  13a00000          MOVNE    r0,#0
009634  1bfffffe          BLNE     bat_drv
;;;6167   		if(BAT_IS_ON[1])bat_drv(1);
009638  e5d80001          LDRB     r0,[r8,#1]  ; BAT_IS_ON

                          AREA ||area_number.2||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  timer0_interrupt PROC
;;;448    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;449    void def_set(int umax__,int ub0__,int ub20__,int usign__,int imax__,int uob__,int numi)
000000  e25ef004          SUBS     pc,lr,#4
;;;450    {
;;;451    ;
;;;452    lc640_write_int(EE_NUMIST,numi);
;;;453    lc640_write_int(EE_MAIN_IST,0);
;;;454    lc640_write_int(EE_UMAX,umax__);
;;;455    lc640_write_int(EE_UB0,ub0__);
;;;456    lc640_write_int(EE_UB20,ub20__);
;;;457    lc640_write_int(EE_TSIGN,70);
;;;458    lc640_write_int(EE_TMAX,80);
;;;459    //lc640_write_int(EE_C_BAT,180);
;;;460    lc640_write_int(EE_USIGN,usign__);
;;;461    lc640_write_int(EE_UMN,187);

;;;464    lc640_write_int(EE_KVZ,1030);

;;;466    lc640_write_int(EE_KIMAX,8);
;;;467    lc640_write_int(EE_APV_ON,0xff);
;;;468    lc640_write_int(EE_IZMAX,20);
;;;469    lc640_write_int(EE_U0B,uob__);
;;;470    lc640_write_int(EE_TZAS,3);
;;;471    
;;;472    lc640_write_int(EE_MNEMO_ON,mnON);
;;;473    lc640_write_int(EE_MNEMO_TIME,30);	
;;;474    
;;;475    lc640_write_int(EE_AV_OFF_AVT,1);
;;;476    lc640_write_int(EE_APV_ON1,apvOFF);
;;;477    }
